body:
Hey Everyone on Avicus
You guys are invited to play Cards Against Humanity with me on livestream those who would like to come and join reply to this thread we will be start at 7:30PM AEST (in around 45 minutes) 

For those who are coming to Cards Against Humanity we are not going to be using Avicus TeamSpeak we will be using the following ([redacted])

I will be streaming over at twitch.tv/shadowolfyt with all of you guys

replies.body:
Heeya shadow, nize idea!
But next time please don't post an IP that doesn't belong to an Avicus service, without having approval by an admin.
Use Skype to distribute the IP or just the Avicus TS if you set another event up.
For now I removed the IP since it's advertising.
